Sentencas: ZrTiO4 in nano-dimension is prepared through the auto ignited combustion techniques.
Titulo: Characterizations and electrical properties of ZrTiO4 ceramic

Sentencas: The synthesized material is characterized by XRD, vibrational spectroscopy, UV-vis spectroscopy, TEM and SEM.
Titulo: Characterizations and electrical properties of ZrTiO4 ceramic

Sentencas: The XRD pattern shows that compound has crystallized in the orthorhombic structure with space group Pbcn and the particle size is obtained as 11.98 nm.
Titulo: Characterizations and electrical properties of ZrTiO4 ceramic

Sentencas: FT Raman and FOR spectra indicate the presence of Zr and Ti octahedron and tetrahedron in the compound.
Titulo: Characterizations and electrical properties of ZrTiO4 ceramic

Sentencas: The particle size is estimated from the TEM image as 14 nm.
Titulo: Characterizations and electrical properties of ZrTiO4 ceramic

Sentencas: Tauc's plot of the optical absorption spectrum gives the optical band gap energy to be 2.88 eV. SEM image of the sample sintered at 1480 degrees C for 2 h indicates minimum porosity with 91% of the theoretical density.
Titulo: Characterizations and electrical properties of ZrTiO4 ceramic

Sentencas: Dielectric properties in the radio and microwave frequencies are measured.
Titulo: Characterizations and electrical properties of ZrTiO4 ceramic

Sentencas: At 1 MHz, epsilon(r) = 37.42, G = 7.49 x 10(-7) S and tan delta = 10(-2) and at 5.23 GHz, epsilon(r) = 36.11, Q x f = 20,026 GHz and T-f 70.7 ppm/K. Dielectric and electrical property measurements in the temperature range 50-250 degrees C indicate that ZrTiO4 is very stable and can be utilized over wide range of temperatures and frequencies.
Titulo: Characterizations and electrical properties of ZrTiO4 ceramic

Sentencas: Ionic conduction and grain boundary effect impart high conductivity to the material.
Titulo: Characterizations and electrical properties of ZrTiO4 ceramic

Sentencas: Nanocrystalline ZrTiO4 can be used as electrolytes in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Characterizations and electrical properties of ZrTiO4 ceramic
